column1: ##Project Description=Human cells from cartilage and meniscus (OA) for 3' SC v3.1 RNA seq 10x Protocol CG000315 Rev B Dual Index  Sample Date = 11/3/2021  2 samples:  Sample 1: cartilage cells Target ~10,000 cells Target 20,000 reads/cell, ~200 million reads/sample  Sample 2: meniscus cells Target ~10,000 cells Target 20,000 reads/cell, ~200 million reads/sample  NextSeq  From Elan:  Basic Details: 	  Sample Submission ID	75_3895  User	Swahn Hannah  Lab	Lotz  Account Code	(08)RAG049617B(C3-554316)-100.00%  Fee	6887.00 USD  Discount	0.00%  Actual Fee	6887.00 USD  Quoted Amount	6887.00 USD  Expected Date	  Actual Date	1/19/2022  Service Id	ca_ns_lotz_20211103_0_10X3prime_HS 	 	 Project Information:	 Study title	Osteoarthritis in Cartilage and Meniscus (Continuation of Project Started by Tomas Duffy) Sample Type description (e.g. Jurkat cell line: liver tissue)	cartilage and meniscus from OA donor submitted to Tony 11/3/2021 Species	human 	 Services:	 Please briefly describe what you would like the Genomics Core to do for you	10X Genomics single cell RNAseq 	 Samples:	 Number of Samples submitted	2 How many reads per sample are needed?
